```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
raw <- read.csv("polls_IT-parliament_2018-10-01.csv")
```

```{r}
raw %>% 
ggplot(aes(x = date, y = LN, color = "red")) + geom_point() + geom_point(aes(x = date, y = MSS, color = "blue"))
```
